name: Competitive Sports
description: Our athletic programs instill the importance of fitness in Club members while helping them build skills, develop confidence, and make lasting friendships. All year long, Club members can participate in a wide variety of sports, including basketball, soccer, baseball, swimming, and more. Through sports, Club members learn that exercise can be a fun and fulfilling part of a healthy lifestyle. Many of our top athletes go on to receive acceptance and scholarships to both high schools and colleges be

howToGetIt: Please contact your local Clubhouse for more information and additional programs offered.
agency: Boys and Girls Clubs of San Francisco
